## MarkerTechniqueParams.poiName property

Fixed name to identify POI options in the POI table. If `poiName` has a value, this value supersedes any value read from the field referenced in `poiNameField`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
poiName?: string;
```
